contact.title: Contact - Tech Portfolio

contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your next project or collaboration opportunity!
contact.name: Name
contact.aboutText:
Hi! I'm Alex, a passionate full-stack developer based in Seoul. I have over 6 years of experience in software development, specializing in web technologies, mobile apps, and cloud solutions.

I love building innovative solutions that solve real-world problems. My expertise spans across React, Node.js, Python, and modern web technologies. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and share my knowledge with the developer community.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech trends, contributing to open-source projects, or mentoring aspiring developers.
contact.interestsList: Full-Stack Development, Cloud Computing, DevOps, Machine Learning, Open Source, Mobile Development, System Architecture, API Design

cta.title: Let's Build Something Amazing!
cta.description: Whether you have a project idea, need technical consultation, or want to collaborate on something exciting, I'd love to hear from you.
